body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joe Hayes and the customer's name is Jessica Campbell.  The conversation is about a random business (a Language School ) and is a conversation about billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I’m with BrightWave Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah! I'm looking for some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with your account. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To assist you better, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you also confirm your phone number for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is three zero three, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, John! I’ll now look into your account and see what we can do to assist you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, John. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
